column4: hey. everytime i try to install ubuntu8.10 on my new pc i get after the loading screen of the installation thousands of errors like "[  260.387083] Buffer I/O error in device sr0, logical block 357797
what is this and how can i fix it?
seems your burned cd is broken, try burning another one or redownload the image
i already tried 2 different cds, both dont work!!!
